review: Constantly loses connection with my wifi. This thing is useless. Very frustrating. Glad I didn't get rid of satellite like I had planned.*UPDATE*After reading some of the answers to the issue of the dropped wifi connection I got the hdmi extender cable out of the box and taped my fire stick vertically to my tv. It hasn't lost the connection since. I hope this helps someone else going through the same problem.
